Detailed Description

Represents an editor wich may contain:
  • texts with adjustable font, foreground-color, background-color and text-attributes (bold, italic, underlined, stroked)
  • images and animations
  • sound objects
  • alignable paragraphs (default, left, right, centered) with a variable line-gap

Model * MultiMediaEditor::CreateModel (   )  const [protected, virtual]
 

Factory method for creating a model. Must be implemented by every class, which needs it's own model. By default a component has no model and 0 is returned. If a model is dynamically created by 'new', it must be deleted in the destructor by e. g. delete GetModel();.

Returns:
Pointer to the model.

Reimplemented from Component.

Reimplemented in EmsEditor.

void MultiMediaEditor::DrawMarkedItemSelection (  DeviceContext *  dc,
const Rect &  item_rect,
INT  item_index
)  [protected, virtual]
 

Draws the selection for a marked item. Per default an alpha blended frame is drawn in the selection color is drawn. The item itself is drawn before the selection, otherwise non transparent images would hide the selection.

Parameters:
dc Device context where the drawing is done.
item_rect Boundaries of the selection.
item_index Index of the marked item.

void MultiMediaEditor::SetBottomLineGap (  UINT8  gap  ) 
 

Every line of the document may have a gap on bottom of the line. Per default the gap is set to 0.
